name: Shplanetarium
description:
Small experimental orrery thing I whipped up pretty much in one evening.

Sizes aren't to scale, but the distances and orbital inclinations of the planets and dwarfs are pretty accurate, which makes for a nice little screensaver.

Might fiddle around with this more in the future, add more satellites, spacecraft, maybe asteroids and such. There are plans for more scenes, such as a very simplified model of the whole Milky Way.

i should also continue work on catbaryo sometime lol
